name: VIRTA HEALTH CORP. AND AFFILIATES
sampleDescriptions: Educate Members and staff about non-pharmacological approaches and the Virta platform to reverse diabetes and treat obesity. Educate Members, Staff, and federal personnel on the importance of obesity
